nodes.label: The Three Little Pigs
nodes.image: log/The Three Little Pigs/The Three Little Pigs/1.jpeg
nodes.title: The protagonists of the story. They are brothers who leave their mother to seek their fortune in the world.

nodes.label: The Big Bad Wolf
nodes.image: log/The Three Little Pigs/The Big Bad Wolf/2.jpeg
nodes.title: The antagonist of the story. He is a cunning and hungry wolf who wants to eat the pigs.

nodes.label: The First Pig
nodes.image: log/The Three Little Pigs/The First Pig/1.jpeg
nodes.title: The youngest and laziest of the three pigs. He builds a house of straw that is easily blown down by the wolf.

nodes.label: The Second Pig
nodes.image: log/The Three Little Pigs/The Second Pig/2.jpeg
nodes.title: The middle and slightly smarter of the three pigs. He builds a house of sticks that is also blown down by the wolf.

nodes.label: The Third Pig
nodes.title: The oldest and wisest of the three pigs. He builds a house of bricks that withstands the wolf's attacks.

nodes.label: The House of Straw
nodes.image: log/The Three Little Pigs/The House of Straw/1.jpeg
nodes.title: The flimsy and weak house built by the first pig. It is located in a field.

nodes.label: The House of Sticks
nodes.image: log/The Three Little Pigs/The House of Sticks/3.jpeg
nodes.title: The slightly stronger but still fragile house built by the second pig. It is located in a forest.

nodes.label: The House of Bricks
nodes.image: log/The Three Little Pigs/The House of Bricks/1.jpeg
nodes.title: The sturdy and durable house built by the third pig. It is located on a hill.

nodes.label: The Pot of Boiling Water
nodes.title: The trap set by the third pig to catch the wolf. It is placed under the chimney of the house of bricks.
